data.eml:eml: Two new species of Glossosoma subgenus Glossosoma (Trichoptera: Glossosomatidae) from India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Saini, Malkiat S., Parey, Sajad H., Rathor, Vikram S. (2013): Two new species of Glossosoma subgenus Glossosoma (Trichoptera: Glossosomatidae) from India. Zootaxa 3664 (3): 392-396, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3664.3.9
